document_data.name: The Exalted Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Exalted Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Exalted''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|21}}
document_data.Activities: The Exalted were bitter rivals with the [[Devoted Mamluk Society|Devoted]], leading to frequent conflicts in the region of the [[Cities of the Pantheon]].
document_data.Organization: The Exalted were led by [[Jamala Abd al-Raffa]], the Most Respected Warrior. The Exalted was a [[moralist]] group dedicated to making Zakhara more civilized and law-abiding.
document_data.Base of Operations: [[I'tiraf]] and [[Hilm]] were the primary bases of operation for the Exalted.
